short_summary: The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services.
description: DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above. Resource(s) Minimum Security Level Required is/are: Secret
full_summary:
**National Procurement Program**
### Temporary Help Services Requirement

The National Procurement Program is seeking to establish a contract for Temporary Help Services for the Department of National Defense (DND). This requirement is limited to suppliers who have a pre-existing supply arrangement under Prospective Suppliers database (PSDB) number EN578-172870 and are qualified in the Special Advisor stream and category 13.9.

#### Suppliers Invited to Bid

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Akkada Professional Services and Zernam Enterprise in JV
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Cistel Technology Inc.
* HubSpoke Inc.
* Maverin Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Mindwire Systems Ltd.
* Niewe Technology and Consulting Ltd.
* Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
* Quallium Corporation
* Solutions LDC Inc.
* Tech4soft Inc.
* The AIM Group Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

#### Scope of Requirements

The DND requires Temporary Help Services to support various operational requirements.

* Level of Security Requirement: Secret
* Duration of Contract: To be confirmed

#### Call for Proposals

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued to suppliers who meet the above-mentioned qualifications. Suppliers are invited to submit their proposals in a timely manner.

#### Important Dates

* Publication Date: April 13, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 19, 2023 at 10:00 AM EST
* Proposal Submission Instructions: Interested suppliers should submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP document.

#### Contacts

CFSG(O-G) Temporary Help
GSFCO-G Temporary Help - DND
613-971-7955
CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
Please note that this information is for informational purposes only. It is recommended to review the RFP document for specific details on the solicitation.

Temporary Help Services Requirement (Français): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4744/s4387561-rfp_fr_0.pdf>
[/documents] 

Please note that this call has expired
